message.content: {"given_definition_quality":40,"better_definition":"south; southern direction","sentence":"我在南。","image_prompt":"A simple animated scene showing a person standing at the bottom of a compass with the letter 'S' (for South) visible, stylized with soft apocalypse animation effects: gentle muted colors, soft edges, hints of overgrown plants or cracks in the ground, and the sun low on the horizon, suggesting a peaceful end-of-the-world vibe.","sentence_translation":"I am in the south."}
